1.content:
## Machine Performance
This dashboard displays detailed information about machine performance. The terms 'machine' and 'host' are used interchangeably.

2.title: CPU usage
2.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| summarize CPU=avg(round(toDouble(cpuusagepercent),decimals:1))
| fields CPU

3.title: RAM:
3.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| summarize RAM=avg(toDouble(ramusagepercent))|fields RAM

4.title: CPU rel. frequency:
4.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| parse content,"JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd  CPURelativeFrequencyPercent = json[CPURelativeFrequencyPercent]
| summarize CPU=avg(toDouble(CPURelativeFrequencyPercent))
| fields CPU

5.title: Disk:
5.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| summarize RAM=avg(toDouble(iopercentdisktime))|fields RAM

7.title: CPU usage and relative frequency over time
7.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and
sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" 
OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| parse content,"JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd CPUUsagePercent=json[CPUUsagePercent],
CPURelativeFrequencyPercent=round(toDouble(json[CPURelativeFrequencyPercent]),decimals:1)
| makeTimeseries  {
`Avg. CPU usage (%)`=avg(CPUUsagePercent), 
`Avg. CPU relative frequency (%)`=avg(CPURelativeFrequencyPercent)
}

8.title: Other metrics per machine (top 10)
8.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| parse content,"JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd NetUtilizationPercent=json[NetUtilizationPercent]
| summarize NetUtilizationPercent=avg(toDouble(NetUtilizationPercent)), by : {host}
| sort NetUtilizationPercent Desc
| limit 10
| fields host, NetUtilizationPercent
| fieldsRename `avg(NetUtilizationPercent)`=NetUtilizationPercent

9.title: CPU usage (%) per machine (top 10)
9.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| parse content,"JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd  CPUUsagePercent = json[CPUUsagePercent]
| summarize CPUUsagePercent=avg(toDouble(CPUUsagePercent)),by:{host}
| sort CPUUsagePercent Desc
| limit 10
| fields host, CPUUsagePercent
| fieldsRename `avg(CPUUsagePercent)`=CPUUsagePercent

10.title: Disk IO per machine (top 10)
10.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| parse content,"JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd  IOPercentDiskTime = json[IOPercentDiskTime]
| summarize IOPercentDiskTime=avg(toDouble(IOPercentDiskTime)),by:{host}
| sort IOPercentDiskTime Desc
| limit 10
| fields host, IOPercentDiskTime
| fieldsRename `avg(IOPercentDiskTime)`=IOPercentDiskTime

11.title: RAM usage (%) per machine (top 10)
11.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| parse content,"JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd  RAMUsagePercent = json[RAMUsagePercent]
| summarize RAMUsagePercent=avg(toDouble(RAMUsagePercent)),by:{host}
| sort RAMUsagePercent Desc
| limit 10
| fields host, RAMUsagePercent
| fieldsRename `avg(RAMUsagePercent)`=RAMUsagePercent

12.title: Machine performance grouped
12.query:
fetch logs
| filter index=="uberagent" and (sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2") 
| parse content,"JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd  FuncCPUUsagePercent = json[CPUUsagePercent], 
IOPSRead = json[IOPSRead],
IOPSWrite = json[IOPSWrite],
IOPercentDiskTime = json[IOPercentDiskTime],
IOCountRead = json[IOCountRead],
IOCountWrite = json[IOCountWrite],
RAMUsageGB = json[RAMUsageGB],
RAMUsagePercent = json[RAMUsagePercent],
NetUtilizationPercent = json[NetUtilizationPercent],
KernelPagedMB = json[KernelPagedMB],
IODurationMs = json[IODurationMs],
KernelNonPagedMB = json[KernelNonPagedMB],
HandleCount = json[HandleCount],
ThreadCount = json[ThreadCount],
CPURelativeFrequencyPercent = json[CPURelativeFrequencyPercent]
| summarize {
    `Avg. CPU (%)`=round(avg(toDouble(FuncCPUUsagePercent)),decimals:1),
    `Avg. IOPS`=avg(toDouble(IOPSRead))+avg(toDouble(IOPSWrite)),
    `Avg. % disk time`= avg(toDouble(IOPercentDiskTime)),
    `Avg. IO latency (ms)` = sum(toDouble(IODurationMs))/(sum(toDouble(IOCountRead)) +  sum(toDouble(IOCountWrite))),
    `Avg. RAM(GB)` = avg(toDouble(RAMUsageGB)),
    `Avg. RAM(%)` = avg(toDouble(RAMUsagePercent)),
    `Avg. network(%)` = avg(toDouble(NetUtilizationPercent)),
    `Avg. paged pool(MB)` = avg(toDouble(KernelPagedMB)),
    `Avg. non-paged pool(MB)` = avg(toDouble(KernelNonPagedMB)),
    `Avg. #handles` = avg(toDouble(HandleCount)),
    `Avg. #threads`= avg(toDouble(ThreadCount)),
    `Avg. CPU rel. frequency(%)`= avg(toDouble(CPURelativeFrequencyPercent)),
    LastSeen = takeLast(timestamp)
},by:{host}
|fieldsRename `Hardware model`=host

14.title: Network:
14.query:
fetch logs
| filter isNotNull(host)
| filter index=="uberagent" and sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary" OR sourcetype=="uberAgent:System:SystemPerformanceSummary2"
| summarize NET=avg(toDouble(netutilizationpercent))|fields NET
